gDesc: Our children's playground is the perfect place for kids to play and explore the world through play while parents enjoy delicious meals and special moments. Our space is arranged with attention to safety and comfort of children, providing them with a carefree environment.
gcDesc: Welcome to our special playground! It was created with the aim of giving children an unforgettable experience of fun, learning and laughter. Located inside our restaurant, this playground is designed to provide a safe and stimulating space where kids can freely express themselves and explore.
